website_summaries.verdict: A well-constructed dry brush that offers extra versatility because it can also be used in the shower.
pros: Offers good exfoliation with its firm bristles, which many users praise
This dry brush also stands out because of its sturdy design
cons: A few users experienced slight irritation from the more coarse bristles
Those with sensitive skin may want to consider the Wholesome Beauty brush instead

customer_reviews.title: It's great! At growing things....
customer_reviews.text: So I loved this when I first got it, but in the intervening weeks, it seems to be growing... Something. It hasn't even been used in the past month, and it's still growing black stuff. It's going in the trash now.
customer_reviews.author: Channing

customer_reviews.title: Concerned about deep crease brush bristles
customer_reviews.text: I just received my bamboo brush! It looks nice but I am concerned about a very deep crease down the middle of the bristles. See pic. Is that normal? Will it go away after I get it wet?
customer_reviews.author: Kylene

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend buying this bath brush, it is poorly made and split after 1 month of minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this but after 1 month of use (only 2-3 times a week) it split and all the bristles fell everywhere making a huge mess. I followed all the cleaning and care instructions provided in the package but unfortunately this product wasn't made to last. I would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: Not old but filled with mold...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased just under a month ago and is already covered in black mold.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage! Seems like Amazon has a lot of crap products these days. This brush grew moldy in less than 3 months. I'm a single person showering once a day so it isn't in water for long periods per day, but it has grown extensive mold around the bristle area. It's also hard to hold onto when wet. The wavy edge doesn't serve as a handle. I'm assuming that's what they were trying to achieve.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: A very nice brush that does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: We use our brushes a lot, especially during the hot summer months. So far, we have had these just under a month and they are working out very well. The seller had sent us specific instructions on how to take care of these brushes to support longevity. I knew the part about washing out the brush after each use, but I did not know about the other hint to keep the brushes in good condition. I know the brushes cost a few dollars more, but I believe they are worth the cost. I would like to take this opportunity to thank the seller for superb support. Wish other sellers would do the same.
customer_reviews.author: WVL

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: Brush is made of good quality wood. Unfortunately the bristles are coarser than I would like. They may hurt on people with sensitive skin. The massage side doesn't do much for me either. For the money I spent, I'd say it is a fair product. - Editing the review. After a short period of time, the brush started to mildew and grow mold. I trashed it. The company does say to bleach the item periodically and to keep it dry. However, I left the brush in my shower for use but in a 'drier' corner...
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo handle is very smooth, the bristles are firm enough to exfoliate well, and the handle is long enough to reach the entire back. I'm not sure what people were expecting from the 'massaging' side, but it was about what I expected. If you're looking for something to actually massage your back, I would recommend something like.
customer_reviews.author: Chanda Reads

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: The solid handle gives a good grip, I like the texture of the brush, it's just scrubby enough and I love the nubbies on the other side, I use that side for putting lotion on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Vital

customer_reviews.title: A good back scrubber
customer_reviews.text: I like the brush, does a good job scrubbing your back in the shower. The brush side is not too scratchy or rough soaps up nicely.The nub side does OK. The way to NOT get black mold is to wash all of the soap out and hang to dry on your towel rack thingy not inside the shower too much moisture pretty simple thing. I think it is a little pricy for the quality but it is well put together does not seem to be made of inferior wood just a simple back brush, hope this helps I am new to this review thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sherie Lightsey

customer_reviews.title: started growing mold
customer_reviews.text: mine started growing mold... on both sides. have to throw it away, and i have only had it for two months. very upset with this product
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Proper maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Works great, great durability since it's wood rather than plastic. For those that complain about mold, please use some bleach solution and clean the entire bathroom. Mold happens when you don't take proper care of the bathroom and let moisture linger for too long. I know because I had mold in my bathroom before. You must maintain good airflow (window + door open) so the moisture can evaporate, or you will have mold on other things you use in the bathroom too, which has nothing to do with the brush itself.
customer_reviews.author: Doodly

customer_reviews.title: Cool Brush with Extras
customer_reviews.text: What a brush!! Oh the little nubbies, my back just had an orgasm! I'm going to buy another one - if I had three hands I would get 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: junglepig

customer_reviews.title: It molds
customer_reviews.text: It says it’s not supposed to mold, it got mold on it in the first 2 months, gross, had to throw it away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received this item two days ago, and was very ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this item two days ago, and was very excited. Used in the shower three times, and hung up outside the shower to dry afterwards. Unfortunately it has already cracked in only two days. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Followed care instructions and when I cleaned it as directed, it discolored and is ugly! Just like every other body brush I've purchased from cheap to expensive it looks awful after about a month of owning it.
customer_reviews.author: JanisLE

customer_reviews.title: Lovely for a Guy's Back and Legs.
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful well made brush and it looks as though it might last a long time - I just started using it for my back AND LEGS as well. I just wish the handle was shorter cause I have glass doors in my bathroom and the handle would, at times, hit the doors, so 4 stars for that. Otherwise, a solid brush and it has some weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dsunfish2000

customer_reviews.title: Not what it seems, not good
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this body brush because of the great reviews I've read, but after purchasing this product and using it, I would have to say it's not worth it. Reasons why: first ,personally I feel the handle is to short and straight. I would prefer one that slants a bit forward to apply adequate pressure to scrub the back. Second, the bristles aren't that strong. Lastly, which is my top reason of not like this product and giving it one star, is the fact that once I finally use it, the bristles smelled of wet dog, once water mixed in. I do NOT recommend purchasing this Bath Blossom Bamboo Body Brush.
customer_reviews.author: Hebba

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A GOOD BATH BRUSH EXPERIENCE
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed brush. The natural bristles are a bit stiff when first used, but with time, the stiffness mellows out and is quite comfortable. The rubber(ish) nubs provided a surprisingly enjoyable massaging sensation over deltoids, trapezius and upper back. The only thing that can not be answered at the time is how long the brush will last before bristles start dropping out, or any other degradation. I'll update this review as required. For now, this product is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jacaguas

customer_reviews.title: I'm quite satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo body brush was everything I hoped for. The bristles were just right for me, not too stiff and not too soft. I'm quite satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ray

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin. The brush is just right for me, the bristles turn soft when in water so, that initial transition time gives this brush a varying ruggedness. Once it has been in the water for sometime, the brisles are pretty soft. Dont use the back of the brush. Since I read from the reviews that it is prone to fungus, I immediately wash and throrouhly dry it after every use and keep it far away from the shower area and it has been working well for me until now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: This was great when it was new, but after using it for a couple months, the bristle adhesive started to goo out (and onto my shower tiling) Looking more closely, the hole through the handle for the rope loop was also discolored and looked moldy inside. I have another back scrubber made of plastic that hasn't had these issues even after years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Brush
customer_reviews.text: Good, but make sure you have somewhere dry to hang it. Mine is starting to look a little gross since I was hanging it in the shower and it seems to have been too moist, leading to discolored wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: PROMOTES MOLD
customer_reviews.text: The dual sided brush holds water and mold began growing in a short time. I will never buy one with dual sides again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful brushes
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are just the best. They feel so good washing backs or as a soft but effective back scratcher. They are very well made and look very nice. Highly recommend for anyone looking for something like this.
customer_reviews.author: munchie

customer_reviews.title: Shedding brush
customer_reviews.text: I notice that the bristles are left over on my skin after using it. I don't think it does a good job scrubbing either. There hasn't been any molding issue for me, I use a suction cup hook to hang it up on my shower wall opposite side of the shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Varnia W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for those "hard to reach" places.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is great for reaching those "hard to reach" areas on my back with the soap. When I work out, I get breakouts around my sports bra line if I don't scrub it really well, and this product really helps me out. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria AndrewsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: but still soft enough that they are comfortable. The handle is wider than what I am ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for several weeks. It appears to be well made. Bristles are densely packed and stiff enough that they get you clean, but still soft enough that they are comfortable. The handle is wider than what I am used to; however, this makes the brush easier to hold. My last brush ($7 from Bed Bth & Bnd) lasted 4 years. I expect this to last just as long. The nubs don't do much for me, but they are not uncomfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: After 6 weeks it's MOLDY!!!
customer_reviews.text: The handle was nice, the bristles were soft, it was easy to hold BUT....I bought this brush on April 19th of this year and have just left it in the shower hanging off a hook. Its not like it was sitting in standing water or anything. I used it maybe 5 times and went to use it today and there is MOLD all over it!!!!! Gross!! Throwing it out and won't buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had this product for 5 months and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for 5 months and it has already cracked. It gets stored after using in a dry place and I have another brand for 5+ years with no issues with cracking. Poorly made. I hang it to dry after using so it has been treated well.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Great back brush!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this brush is made. The handle looks like it will last a long time and even when wet you still have a firm grip and it doesn't feel like it will slip. The bristles are not extreamly stiff but just enough to get your back clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ed  H

customer_reviews.title: Bristles Too Soft, Handle Not as Long as Expected, Hard to Use in the Shower. BUT...makes a GREAT truck tire cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would have harder bristles and a longer handle. I have bad arthritis in my shoulders so reaching behind to my back is difficult and causes much pain so I figured a body brush with a long handle would do the trick, and even though I'm able to get the brush to my back the bristles are so soft that I don't really get a good scrub and soap runs down the handle making it slippery and hard to work with. I turned it into brush for my truck tires so I could get some good use out of it :)
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just tried this out for dry brushing and it works great! My advice is to wash it well before you use, as mine was quite dusty and lost several bristles upon first use. Not a big deal, but the dust kind of grossed me out and the bristles were all over my rug.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, lasted for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Good product that I used daily. Because of the way the bamboo pieces that make up the handle are attached to each other, eventually water damage caused the individual pieces to split apart and the brush also to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Salt

customer_reviews.title: It's Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got one for my daughters stocking, she liked it so well my son in law thought he would like one. When I ordered one for him I also ordered one for myself. I love it. would tell anyone to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Caustic Cactus

customer_reviews.title: Not at all workable as cannot grip the handle; the rubber prong-side almost useless.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I am going to return this bath brush; the handle is so very big, I can barely wrap my hand around it. Extremely awkward to hold. The rubber massaging side does not work at all. So sorry, but it is not an item I can endorse. Perhaps it was created for athletes, buffed up muscle men; I could imagine they could maneuver the handle and have enough pressure to massage the back with the rubber prongs.
customer_reviews.author: Claudette

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: From the beginning, the brush had a 1 inch "knot" in the the bristles which reduces the softness. And after 12 months, the wood on the head has split in 2 places.
customer_reviews.author: Woosch

customer_reviews.title: The bristles shed
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job for dry brushing or just scratching but with every use the bristles shed. I haven't tried to use it in the shower because of how many bristles come out while dry.
customer_reviews.author: Tamu

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty great and is holding up really well in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty great and is holding up really well in my bathroom. The bristles are perfect for giving your body a good exfoliation. I haven't quite figured out what to use the other side for yet. haha
customer_reviews.author: travel life

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to Use and Made with Natural Bristles
customer_reviews.text: A great body brush for the shower or bath, but I do wish the handle was about 2 inches longer to make it easier to reach the middle of my back. Natural bamboo and natural bristles...a great combination!
customer_reviews.author: David Spegele

customer_reviews.title: Got moldy and black within 2 weeks. I did ...
customer_reviews.text: Got moldy and black within 2 weeks. I did not allow it to air dry completely between each use. However, I didnt expect this to be as high a maintenance item as it was.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to reach the middle of my back
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are nice and firm. But the handle isn’t long enough. I’m not very flexible so I got this with the idea that I would be able to wash my back better. Still hard to reach the middle of my back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bristles firm and dense for a comfortable brushing. The nubby side is like being in a spa and it’s invigorating while being gentle.
customer_reviews.author: VetintheWest

customer_reviews.title: Two things I'm not perfectly happy are: 1
customer_reviews.text: Two things I'm not quite happy with are: 1. It is a bit heavier than I expected. 2. The bristle side feels a bit rough on the back skin. Otherwise it serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: It's A Brush
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this does what it's supposed to do. I got it for my husband, but I guess it's for me too. It does work great. We like it also because of the long handle and it's made out of bamboo. *Late review, sorry!
customer_reviews.author: C. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a week before it became full of mildew. There is no advice on how to clean it either.
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good brush, but could be even better.
customer_reviews.text: This brush works well, and has lasted well so far ( 4 months) it would be an improvement if the handle had some type of groves cut into them. Or a rubber handle to better grip brush. As it does get slippery when soaped up.
customer_reviews.author: Don Ing

customer_reviews.title: Molded after a month
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for just over a month. Set it up to dry when not using it but it still molded around edges of bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Knapp

customer_reviews.title: This is a great brush that I would give 5 stars except that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush that I would give 5 stars except that it cracked very young. I think I'd only been using it a couple of weeks and it developed a crack in the wood at about 1 o'clock as you're looking at the brush side. Otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Feel good on my feet and back
customer_reviews.text: Feels great but I can't get mold off even soaking in straight bleach. I'm saddened because I love how it works .
customer_reviews.author: Materialmomny

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Was able to pick this up on prime day. I had been looking for a back brush, but was too cheap to get one before. The bristles are soft, but still nice and dense so they work great for scrubbing and it is just the right length; study handle. I haven't used it for long, but no issues so far with bristles coming loose or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best Bath Brush Ever
customer_reviews.text: Brush has perfect bristles, not too soft or hard really leaves your skin feeling super clean. Other side is awesome for massaging your back and shoulders which was an unexpected extra!! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Back Brush
customer_reviews.text: Works well.... has a massager on one side a brush scrubber on the other. Nice length and love the bamboo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well and feels great
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a bath brush that would hold up and work well. Have tried others and not been happy. They have been difficult to clean, too harsh, bristles fall out, etc. This product works beautifully, came with instructions on care and cleaning and feels wonderful on my skin. The massage side is an extra plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am having to throw it away. Bought it in June 2019.
customer_reviews.text: It has developed black curd down in the brush hairs and bleeding down on the wood. I tried soaking it in heavy bleach water for 12hr. Didn't work and now it is headed for the trash can. This is the first time seeing this happen. I have no answer for why????
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD P

customer_reviews.title: It's good quality bristles but after a month the bamboo started ...
customer_reviews.text: It's good quality bristles but after a month the bamboo started to mildew where the bristles were. I wouldn't really recommend this for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal B.

customer_reviews.title: Good brush for non-sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: These are great brushes. I bought one for my back - a little rough for my back, and one for my feet - perfect for my feet. the massaging nubs are nice but I rarely use them. I've been using these for at least a month and they are still holding up fine. I recommend this brush for non-sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: TFYOV

customer_reviews.title: Extremely soft bristles
customer_reviews.text: Way too soft, totally defeats the purpose of dry brushing. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: S Gurgov

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: This was the second one I've bought, wore out the brush part in a 5 year period. Well worth the price, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: D Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Like a spa brush
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the shower. The bristles are directly attached into the wood so they will not come out like cheap brushes. The head is also solid with the handle so it won't fall off, again, like other cheap brushes. The handle is thick and very high quality. This bristles can be a little rough duo thou have to just be gentle. Keep out of shower and humidity and dry after the shower and you won't have problems with mold
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The handle is solid and a good size to reach those are to get spots
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this body brush! Nothing about it is cheap. The handle is solid and a good size to reach those are to get spots. The bristles feel nice and don't fall out like on a cheap brush. There is a noticeable difference in my skin since I have been using this. After using it, I get that "just went to the spa" feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Best bath brush I've owned! Just soft enough that it won't tear sensitive skin apart; but just rough enough that you feel like you get a good scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Hines

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The it's too short and neither side works very well
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is not a brush for women with smallish hands. It's heavy, clunky and the rope attached to it, is only big enough to get two fingers through which doesn't give enough support to actually use on your back. Definitely would not recommend this to friends. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: BouvierChick

customer_reviews.title: Bristles are a too soft and the handle is too ...
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are a too soft and the handle is too short and fat. It works though and I will try another of their products again.
customer_reviews.author: tom wo RFID

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for dry brushing, better than hand held and no problem with a detachable head flying off.
customer_reviews.author: tomboy

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush and Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brush, and what makes it even better is that the manufacturer sent a follow up message through Amazon with tips on how to clean and maintain the brush so it doesn't get mildew or mold buildup. I thought that was pretty cool. Would definitely recommend to someone considering this brush.
customer_reviews.author: M. Erskine

customer_reviews.title: and it looked like the 2-feature brush was going to be convenient and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the product on time, and it looked like the 2-feature brush was going to be convenient and effective. Although, the handle is too wide for my hands, so it's very uncomfortable when brushing my back. Also, and that was my mistake, I hang it in my shower cady, after I shower, so it's built up mold and the massagers are now black. I am frustrated : (
customer_reviews.author: Mililicious

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to reach areas of back
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are a bit harsh on the skin and really wish it had a bent handle which would make it a heck of a lot easier to reach all areas of my back!
customer_reviews.author: Erika W

customer_reviews.title: Great bath scruber
customer_reviews.text: The brush was high quality. I like that it had a massage brush for cellulite on one side and the scrub brush on the other. The silk pouch to store it in was also a nice touch. "
customer_reviews.author: Carla J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Putting the Scrub in the Tub
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, durability and performance wise. Arrived in perfect condition and on time. Although I can shower without one, I'd rather not.
customer_reviews.author: James Harings

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brush!
customer_reviews.text: I just had back surgery, and got this brush to remove all of the surgical tape that was all over my back. This is a high quality product that worked perfectly. I will continue to use it going forward just to clean my back !
customer_reviews.author: deborah silverman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably worthless, cheap. Immediately molded all over bristles and handle. Tried to clean and bristles disintegrated to unusable. More importantly my back itched all over, torture (I only used on my back). I had absolutely no problem w/old brush (should have kept) after using for over 20 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: linda l.

customer_reviews.title: Too straight
customer_reviews.text: Too straight. I should have realized this wouldn’t work for me. I’m older and have limited movementof my arm...which is really why I needed the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Charles routhier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Brush
customer_reviews.text: The bath brush is excellent. The bamboo wood handle is great and the bristles are not too soft or too hard. The only drawback is that the brush could be a little longer; otherwise, it is GREAT! I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: George G.

customer_reviews.title: Have been using the brush daily in the shower and it's a great quality brush
customer_reviews.text: " Prompt delivery and secure packaging. Have been using the brush daily in the shower and it's a great quality brush.Dries quickly. Noticing a great difference in the softness of my skin. The brush was a little hard at first, but has softened a bit with use. I do not use the massaging nubs, but the brush is great! "
customer_reviews.author: Ama Zon

customer_reviews.title: Package is beautiful! I had thought the brush would not be ...
customer_reviews.text: Package is beautiful! I had thought the brush would not be so comfortable. But, I was wrong. I love the brush. The other side you can use to knock your body part. I selected longer handle, which can reach to my back no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dennis

customer_reviews.title: The most important thing to know is you’re only getting one item when the picture she has three
customer_reviews.text: This item seems to be of good quality but I think the advertising or the picture was deceptive . I was under the impression that I was buying three items but I only got one .
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Good reach and great design and execution
customer_reviews.text: Man I needed this. Reaches the remote parts of my back. Good reach and great design and execution. Looking forward to a long relationship with my new shower buddy.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy body brush
customer_reviews.text: Nice back brush. Christmas gift for daughter who loves using it with sugar scrub to remove dead body cells. Very well made. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J Leatherwood

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The brush is good for its price. The only thing I don't like about it is that it doesn't have a grip on the handle. It was a challenge to hold it the entire time without it slipping out of my hand. Other than that, it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Semper514

customer_reviews.title: Just like other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Just like other reviews, about a month in it has black mold / mildew all over the wood peg side and I assume it's in the bristles too. Bristles could've been a little stiffer also.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Bristles be fallin
customer_reviews.text: I love shower brushes. The massaging nodes are nice. These bristles started to fall out sooner than my previous brush, which was under the name of Hodor I believe (found on amazon). Maybe I'm exfoliating too hard... or these bristles just can't hang.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rotting after using less than two months.
customer_reviews.text: Similar to some of the pictures posted by other reviewers, the wood on this brush started rotting after only 6-7 weeks of use. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: George Blue

customer_reviews.title: Wish handle was longer
customer_reviews.text: I li9ke this. Construction appears very good and I am hopeful the bamboo construction will not rot. My only concern is that I wish the handle was about 4" longer to better reach my middle and lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Spolar

customer_reviews.title: Round side kind of useless but brush side okay
customer_reviews.text: Wish brush side was a little stiffer to really scratch but gets in hard to reach places. Round side kind of useless but brush side okay.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Body Brush.
customer_reviews.text: Rather short. Rather heavy. That said, the brush is effective in scrubbing and feels very firm, but not abrasive. It soaps up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: mib

customer_reviews.title: Good Back Scratcher!!
customer_reviews.text: Really helpful in scratching my back and reaching those hard to reach areas while showering!! My only peeve is I wish the bristles were a little harder. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: James Fennell

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty brush...one that will last for a long time. It comes in such pretty bag I dont want to toss it...do you have any sugestions for use of the bag 5/5
customer_reviews.author: TsarWilliam

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brush side is good... other side is useless in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: houle

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome back brush! The bristles are firm, but are not harsh on the skin. The length of the brush is perfect to get hard to reach areas of the back. I've bought other brushes with the nylon bristles that would bend over time. This brush appears to one that will last a long time. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good to use for dry brushing and scrubbing your back.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Solitaire

customer_reviews.title: Body Brush
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my husband was looking for. Nice quality wood & workmanship! Money well spent. Shipping was fast. Sellers were great at follow up to make sure that we are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine, does what it’s supposed to, i bought it to exfoliate hoping my acne would get better and it has so it’s a good product
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Devenish

customer_reviews.title: Great brush, much nicer stiffer bristles than my last ...
customer_reviews.text: Great brush, much nicer stiffer bristles than my last one. My only complaint is that it's about 2 inches shorter than my last one, but I'm learning to live with it.
customer_reviews.author: wader1234

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Brush for Long Term
customer_reviews.text: I liked this brush in the first week or two, but then the wood got molded and I had to toss it.
customer_reviews.author: spike4

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a good quality brush. My husband asked me to get him one of these for wet use. As to whether or not it is soft or hard, it depends whom you are! For me it was way too stiff. My husband thought it was perfect if not a bit soft!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Really like it at first
customer_reviews.text: I got this few weeks ago. Really like it at first ... really nice material and the brush helped take off my dead skin for the back.. But last 2 weeks it started to have these mould even I dry it after use. I would not recommend this since you have to use it in bathroom ...
customer_reviews.author: Ha M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Brush!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is great! Love that both sides are functional. I am thinking of adding one to each of the gift baskets that I make.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The bristles are firm enough to do their job without being so stiff that they're scratchy. Delivery was prompt. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: chisumgranny

product_meta.title: Bath Blossom Bamboo Body Brush for Back Scrubber - Natural Bristles Shower Brush with Long Handle - Excellent for Exfoliating Skin and Cellulite - Use Wet or Dry Brushing - Suitable for Men and Women
product_meta.description: LIKE HAVING TWO BRUSHES IN ONE With 40 cm long handle, you can reach the middle of your back, the backs of your legs and other tricky spots with this high quality bamboo body brush.;HYGIENIC AND NATURAL - Made of the finest bamboo material, it will not develop mildew.;DRY BRUSHING YOUR SKIN AND STIMULATE - Use dry to boost circulation in order to help cellulite problems and promote skin health and glows.;EXFOLIATE, CLEAN & REMOVE DEAD SKIN - Use with your favorite body wash or scrubs to cleanse and remove dead skin in the tub or shower.;VERY EASY TO CLEAN & MAINTAIN - Just rinse after use and hang the brush up by the rope on the handle for drip drying or air drying.
feature_bullets: LIKE HAVING TWO BRUSHES IN ONE - With the 16" handle, you can reach the middle of your back, the backs of your legs and other tricky spots with this high quality bamboo body brush.
HYGIENIC AND NATURAL - Made of the finest bamboo material, sturdy enough to use daily.
DRY BRUSHING YOUR SKIN AND STIMULATE - Use dry to boost circulation and promote skin health and glows, used as a cellulite massager as well.
EXFOLIATE, CLEAN & REMOVE DEAD SKIN - Use with your favorite body wash or scrubs to cleanse and remove dead skin in the tub or shower.
VERY EASY TO CLEAN & MAINTAIN - Just rinse after use and hang the brush up by the rope on the handle for drip drying or air drying.
